body.name: Weture Big and Tall Office Chair 500lbs, Heavy Duty Office Chair for Long Hours, Breathable Leather Ergonomic Office Chair for Back Pain Relief, Executive Office Chair for Heavy People (Black)
features: 【About Accessories】Tip: Armrests, screws, and wheel sets are all in the compartment behind the chair backrest.

【Ergonomic Excellence】Tired of enduring back pain and sluggishness caused by long hours at your desk? Look no further! The most comfortable ergonomic office chair with S-shaped backrest design and adjustable lumbar support ensure proper alignment with your spine, allowing you to sit comfortably for extended periods. Plus, overly smooth wheels lack a stable grip and are the culprit of your back pain.

【Breathing Leather】Weture big and tall office chair are made of high quality breathing leather. Breathable leather upholstery surpasses the breathability and heat dissipation of bonded leather, ensuring a cool and comfortable seating experience. Say goodbye to fading and flaking, our breathable leather office chair maintains its original look for a long time.

【PU Wheels Can Also Protect Your Back】We have done several comparison tests. The same person, respectively, use a week smooth PU wheel ergonomic chair and Weture stable grip PU wheel ergonomic chair. Too smooth PU wheel lacks strong grip, the control group will be used in the process of uncontrolled out of the original position, resulting in deformation of the user's lumbar posture, soreness. The stable grip PU wheels has stable sitting posture and can significantly reduce sedentary soreness.

【Stability and durability】Built to withstand the test of time, the Weture heavy duty office chair features a 4-level gas lift and premium chair base that surpass BFIM 1.5 times testing and meet SGS standards. With a weight capacity of up to 500lb, this xl luxury office desk chair offers unwavering stability and eliminates the worry of gradual sinking. Every tilt is safe and secure.

【Adjustable and Tiltable】Adjust the tilt angle effortlessly within the range of 90° to 120° using the discreet black knob beneath the seat. And the chair with wheels and arms can rotate smoothly 360 degrees. With a 4-inch height adjustment range, this high back Barcalounger office chair accommodates individuals of all heights, ensuring a perfect fit for everyone.

【Easy Assembly】Extended screws are used to make assembly easier and more efficient. Should you encounter any issues with the office chair for back pain relief, feel free to reach out to us. Our dedicated after-sales team ensures a response within 24 hours, promising 100% satisfactory solutions.

Introducing the Weture Premium Executive Leather Chair - Your Key to Supreme Comfort! VERSATILITY This large office chair serves as the ideal solution for executives, managers, students, gamers, and anyone facing back-related difficulties. THE BEST BACK PROTECTOR Equipped with a spring pack, our executive chair provides extra cushioning and optimum support, minimizing the chances of back strains. BUILT TO LAST With a super-sturdy construction and a durable metal base, the executive chair promises long-lasting use without any issues. The Premium Leather is super-easy to clean and maintain, ensuring longevity despite daily wear and tear. LUXURIOUS BIG CHAIR Upgrade your workspace aesthetics with our executive chairs, delivering a sophisticated appearance that enhances your office ambiance. Ready to Elevate Your Home& Office? Click "Add To Cart" NOW and experience the perfect blend of comfort, durability, and different style with our Executive 500lbs Big and Tall Office Chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wide seat, perfect for crossed legged sitting!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really like this chair for three reasons.1. It was super easy to put together.2. The cushion is nice and thick. Thicker than most chairs I’ve looked at.3. It’s nice and wide. Very comfortable to sit in and has plenty of room for sitting crossed legged.I love the fabric, it’s easy to clean. I already got a pen mark on it 🙄 but it came right out with some spot shot. Definitely would recommend this chair. Only downside is that it doesn’t have wheels but for the price and the benefits, I can live without wheels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality of chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair was very comfy and looks amazing in my office space. The only thing missing is wheels, it's a bit hard to move around. Overall I love this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, Soft, Comfortable and Easy Assembly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stylish
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a wider chair for my husband since he is on the larger side, and this looked to fit the bill. It did not disappoint! It’s more than wide enough, and while a bit firm it’s more in a supportive than uncomfortable way. I find it easier to sit in for hours than my much more thickly cushioned chair. The cushion does indent a bit after a bit of use, so if you want it to keep that crisp straight line for aesthetic reasons, be aware of that. It also cleans up very well, which our cats have thoroughly tested. They seem to really like it, too. Overall, I’m very tempted to order another when my chair finally gives out and match his.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably better than the ones that cost 3x as much!!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this chair. I waited for a few months and kept researching to decide on which one I wanted. I couldn't bring myself to spend $200+ on this style so I was very excited when I found this one that looked very comfy at a great price point. I still see a chair like this on tiktok and buzzfeed that's over $200 with a much thinner seat. This one is way more comfortable, most likely!!I put it together myself and it only took fifteen minutes or so. Would have been quicker with another person to help hold the top piece in place while I put the bottom on and screwed it in (I used an electric screwdriver with a hex bit instead of the little Allen wrench it came with), but I basically leaned all my weight on the bottom to push it into place, felt around for the screw holes and screwed them in by hand enough that they held the bottom on and then just finished with the screwdriver. It's definitely very comfortable. The bottom cushion is VERY thick. It does compress throughout the day, so by the end of my work day it's not as fluffy as it is in the morning, but it's (I'm assuming) memory foam so that expected. It's right back up to max fluffy the next morning. I love sitting with one or both legs bent/sitting on my feet, so this is perfect for my home office. I thought I'd dislike the lack of wheels, but it really doesn't bother me at all. It's easy enough to shift here and there when I need to, and the feet have thick felt pads so it doesn't scratch the floor (which would be a big problem for me if it did, since I rent).I will say, I have several new pairs of black leggings and the seat seems to be a bit discolored from the dye in the leggings, but it doesn't bother me. I haven't tried cleaning it. Worst case if it happens to you and it bothers you, Amazon sells covers for computer chairs that would probably fit this, or just put a pillow or a blanket over the seat.I'm seriously considering buying another one for my desk at the office (I work hybrid). I'll never go back to a chair with arms for my home office though!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This chair was very easy to set up. It’s a great size and I love the color it seems very durable as well. The only thing I would change would to order the legs with wheels other than that it’s really great chair, and I love being able sit crisscross in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and large seat
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this chair for a few months now and I love it! It has a wide seat which is great for plus size people, and you don’t feel like you are falling out of the seat! Only thing is the feet on the chair are so sharp! It hurts to step on them accidentally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This chair is great. It was easy to assemble. It's very stylish. The seat is wide, the cover is an attractive off-white faux leather that can be cleaned easily and the weight is heavy. Like really heavy! It doesn't have wheels, which I knew when I ordered it. I figured that I can just lift it to move it in and out from under my desk as I work. I didn't take into consideration how heavy the chair is. But that's a good thing for someone looking for a stationary chair.
